title: Fantasy Card & Board Game Vol.1 - UI Navigation and Mechanics
description: Bring your fantasy card or board game to life with our 137 sound pack! Featuring a variety of card shuffles, dice rolls, coin flips, piece movements, transitional whooshes, and UI sounds, our audio effects will add depth and excitement to your project.
longDescription:
Immerse your players in the world of your fantasy board or card game with our comprehensive 137 sound pack. From the satisfying clink of coins to the rustle of shuffling cards, our audio effects will enhance every aspect of your game. The first volume in the series includes a variety of realistic and nonrealistic sound effects for card shuffles, dice rolls, coin flips, and board piece movements, as well as loops for piece sliding and an assortment of UI sounds for menus and transitions. Whether your game takes place in a magical realm or a medieval setting, our sound pack will help you create an engaging experience for your players.
